Every Ultraman show after 80 but Before Mebius is Not-Canon in Mebius. (Because those are all in their own continuity while Showa always had Old Ultramen showing up to assist after starting with "Return of Ultraman")

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b2a8f56368722a708c2500#post_54b2a8f56368722a708c2500
[bq="mariomarc"]Well
It's over now.
That finale was amazing.
I cried a bit, I laughed a bit, I screamed during the final attack, I loved it.
I loved that entire show.
The effects and action scenes were wonderful, I loved the music, but most of all I loved the characters.
Everyone was so freaking likable, and well developed.
Ultraman Mebius is an amazing show, and everyone should watch it.
I'm kind of sad it's over.[/bq]
It was meh for me.
Glad you like it more than me.
